name: Wild Bill
tagline: The early career of legendary lawman Wild Bill Hickock is telescoped and culminates in his relocation in Deadwood and a reunion with Calamity Jane.

name: Priceless
tagline: Through a set of wacky circumstances, a young gold digger mistakenly woos a mild-mannered bartender thinking he's a wealthy suitor.

name: Scenes from the Class Struggle in Beverly Hills
tagline: The widow's houseboy and the divorcee's chauffeur bet on which will bed the other's employer first.

name: Meatballs III: Summer Job
tagline: The ghost of a dead porn star comes to Earth to help a nerd with his sex life.

name: Tarzan and the Lost City
tagline: Tarzan returns to his homeland of Africa to save his home from destruction.

name: Mrs. Parker and the Vicious Circle
tagline: Dorothy Parker remembers the heyday of the Algonquin Round Table, a circle of friends whose barbed wit, like hers, was fueled by alcohol and flirted with despair.

name: Conquest
tagline: A polish countess becomes Napoleon Bonaparte's mistress at the urging of Polish leaders, who feel she might influence him to make Poland independent.

name: The Saratov Approach
tagline: Two missionaries are kidnapped and held for ransom while serving in Russia.

name: The Journey of Natty Gann
tagline: In the 1930s, a tomboyish girl runs away from her guardian to join her single father who is 2,000 miles away, because there was work there.

name: The Oscar Nominated Short Films 2013: Animation
tagline: Collective screening of the Academy Award nominated short films from the Animation category for 2013.

name: Farinelli
castlist: Renaud du Peloux de Saint Romain

name: Mallrats
tagline: Both dumped by their girlfriends, two best friends seek refuge in the local mall.

name: Let the Right One In
tagline: Oskar, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Eli, a beautiful but peculiar girl.

name: Othello
tagline: The evil Iago pretends to be friend of Othello in order to manipulate him to serve his own end in the film version of this Shakespeare classic.

name: Intimate Strangers
tagline: A Frenchwoman tells her marital troubles to a man she mistakes for a psychiatrist, and soon they form an unusual relationship.

name: Faithful
tagline: A depressed housewife whose husband is having an affair contemplates suicide, but changes her mind when she faces death by a killer hired to do her in.

name: Death and the Maiden
tagline: A political activist is convinced that her guest is a man who once tortured her for the government.

name: Eating
tagline: A group of young and middle-aged women gather for the birthday party of a friend and talk about their lives and food they cook for their husbands, boyfriends, or themselves.

name: Fanaa
tagline: Set in Delhi and the Kashmir Valley, a blind woman falls in love with a rakish tour guide who hides a terrible secret...

name: King Richard and the Crusaders
tagline: While leading the Third Crusade, King Richard Lionheart battles treachery in his own camp as well as the Saracens and their charismatic leader Saladin.

name: Gloria
tagline: A story set in Santiago and centered on Gloria, a free-spirited older woman, and the realities of her whirlwind relationship with a former naval officer whom she meets out in the clubs.

name: Guru
tagline: A villager, Gurukant Desai, arrives in Bombay 1958, and rises from its streets to become the GURU, the biggest tycoon in Indian history.

name: The Sea Inside
tagline: The real-life story of Spaniard Ramon Sampedro, who fought a 30 year campaign in favor of euthanasia and his own right to die.

name: A Prophet
tagline: A young Arab man is sent to a French prison where he becomes a mafia kingpin.

name: The Daytrippers
tagline: When a happily married woman discovers a love letter written by her husband to an unknown party, she enlists her dysfunctional family to discover the truth.

name: Strawberry and Chocolate

production.name: Instituto Cubano del Arte e Industrias Cinematográficos (ICAIC)

tagline: This Oscar nominated film is the story of two men who are opposites, one gay, the other straight, one a fierce communist, the other a fierce individualist, one suspicious, the other accepting, and how they come to love each other.

name: The Wackness
tagline: It's the summer of 1994, and the streets of New York are pulsing with hip-hop. Set against this backdrop, a lonely teenager named Luke Shapiro spends his last summer before university selling marijuana throughout New York City, trading it with his unorthodox psychotherapist for treatment, while having a crush on his stepdaughter.

name: The Sheltering Sky
tagline: The American artist couple Port and Kit Moresby travel aimlessly through Africa, searching for new experiences that could give sense to their relationship. But the flight to distant regions only leads both deeper into despair.

name: Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi
tagline: A middle-aged man who lost his love for life rediscovers it by assuming a new identity in order to rekindle the romantic spark in his marriage.

name: Raising Victor Vargas
tagline: A Lower East Side teen-ager struggles to find some sanity while surrounded by an eccentric grandmother, a crazy new girlfriend, and a longing younger brother.

name: Cadence
tagline: Charlie Sheen plays a rebellious inmate in an Army stockade.

name: Strangers with Candy
tagline: A prequel to the critically acclaimed series featuring Jerri Blank, a 46 year-old ex-junkie, ex-con who returns to high school in a bid to start her life over.

name: Blackfish
tagline: A documentary following the controversial captivity of killer whales, and its dangers for both humans and whales.

name: Auto Focus
tagline: A story about "Hogan's Heroes" star Bob Crane and his friendship with John Carpenter.

name: Rust and Bone
tagline: Put in charge of his young son, Alain leaves Belgium for Antibes to live with his sister and her husband as a family. Alain's bond with Stephanie, a killer whale trainer, grows deeper after Stephanie suffers a horrible accident.

name: Ravenous
tagline: Captain John Boyd's promotion stations him at a fort where a rescued man tells a disturbing tale of cannibalism.

name: The Krays
tagline: This fact-based movie follows the life of the twin crime-lords in London's 60's underworld.

name: Brick
tagline: A teenage loner pushes his way into the underworld of a high school crime ring to investigate the disappearance of his ex-girlfriend.

name: Trick
tagline: The misadventures of two young gay men, trying to find a place to be alone, one night in Manhattan.

name: Beyond the Mat
tagline: Heartfelt documentry focusing on the lives of professional wrestlers and how their sport is not fake.

name: Avenue Montaigne
tagline: A young woman arrives in Paris where she finds a job as a waitress in bar next on Avenue Montaigne that caters to the surrounding theaters and the wealthy inhabitants of the area. She will meet a pianist, a famous actress and a great art collector, and become acquainted with the "luxurious" world her grandmother has told her about since her childhood.

name: El mariachi
tagline: A traveling mariachi is mistaken for a murderous criminal and must hide from a gang bent on killing him.

name: We Don't Live Here Anymore
tagline: An indiscretion between two close friends tears down their respective marriages.

name: I Love You Phillip Morris
tagline: A cop turns con man once he comes out of the closet. Once imprisoned, he meets the second love of his life, whom he'll stop at nothing to be with.

name: Mom and Dad Save the World
Gate 2: The Trespassers
tagline: Four teens summon forth a diminuitive, demonic minion from The Other Side to do their bidding and grant their wishes, but of course, they must all ultimately pay the price...

name: Novocaine
tagline: A dentist finds himself a murder suspect after a sexy patient seduces him into prescribing her drugs.

name: The Work and the Glory II: American Zion
Billy's Hollywood Screen Kiss
tagline: Billy is a gay fine-arts photographer who falls in love with straight coffee-shop waiter Gabriel.

name: Queen Margot
tagline: Young Queen Margot finds herself trapped in an arranged marriage amidst a religious war between Catholics and Protestants. She hopes to escape with a new lover, but finds herself imprisoned by her powerful and ruthless family.

name: Rad
tagline: The story of one young man, Cru Jones, who has the intensity and desire to win a BMX race called Helltrack.

name: Night on Earth
tagline: An anthology of 5 different cab drivers in 5 American and European cities and their remarkable fares on the same eventful night.

name: The Trip
tagline: Steve Coogan has been asked by The Observer to tour the country's finest restaurants, but after his girlfriend backs out on him he must take his best friend and source of eternal aggravation, Rob Brydon.

production.name: Government of British Columbia Film Incentive BC Program

name: Monsieur Lazhar
tagline: At a Montréal public grade school, an Algerian immigrant is hired to replace a popular teacher who committed suicide in her classroom. While helping his students deal with their grief, his own recent loss is revealed.

name: Footnote
tagline: Eliezer and Uriel Shkolnik are father and son as well as rival professors in Talmudic Studies. When both men learn that Eliezer will be lauded for his work, their complicated relationship reaches a new peak.

name: Hum Saath-Saath Hain: We Stand United
Le Week-End
tagline: A British couple return to Paris many years after their honeymoon there in an attempt to rejuvenate their marriage.

name: Nemesis
tagline: An retired cyborg Los Angeles policeman is forced out of retirement and is assigned to apprehend his former partner whom is smuggling data to a terrorist organization that plots to assassinate government officials.

name: Bad Lieutenant
tagline: While investigating a young nun's rape, a corrupt New York City police detective, with a serious drug and gambling addiction, tries to change his ways and find forgiveness.

name: Can't Stop the Music
tagline: This is a Pseudo autobiography of disco's The Village People

name: ...And God Created Woman
tagline: In sunny St. Tropez, a young sexpot loves one brother but marries the other.

name: Roar
tagline: Ravening jungle beasts assemble in flocks to invade an otherwise quiet home where they chase humans up and down stairways and from one room to another.

name: Wilson
tagline: A chronicle of the political career of US President Woodrow Wilson.

name: I Was a Teenage Werewolf
tagline: A troubled teenager seeks help through hypnotherapy, but his evil doctor uses him for regression experiments that transform him into a rampaging werewolf.

name: Limbo
tagline: Unconventional narrative about the interactions amongst a group of people in a small town in Alaska, each of whom has guards a secret.

name: Oliver Twist
tagline: An adaptation of the classic Dickens tale, where an orphan meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.

production.name: China Film Release Import and Export Company
